member.name: D3D10_BIND_FLAG
member.summary: Identifies how to bind a resource to the pipeline.

member.name: D3D10_BIND_FLAG.D3D10_BIND_VERTEX_BUFFER
member.summary: Bind a buffer as a vertex buffer to the input-assembler stage.

member.name: D3D10_BIND_FLAG.D3D10_BIND_INDEX_BUFFER
member.summary: Bind a buffer as an index buffer to the input-assembler stage.

member.name: D3D10_BIND_FLAG.D3D10_BIND_CONSTANT_BUFFER
member.summary: Bind a buffer as a constant buffer to a shader stage; this flag may NOT be combined with any other bind flag.

member.name: D3D10_BIND_FLAG.D3D10_BIND_SHADER_RESOURCE
member.summary: Bind a buffer or texture to a shader stage; this flag cannot be used with the flag.

member.name: D3D10_BIND_FLAG.D3D10_BIND_STREAM_OUTPUT
member.summary: Bind an output buffer for the stream-output stage.

member.name: D3D10_BIND_FLAG.D3D10_BIND_RENDER_TARGET
member.summary: Bind a texture as a render target for the output-merger stage.

member.name: D3D10_BIND_FLAG.D3D10_BIND_DEPTH_STENCIL
member.summary: Bind a texture as a depth-stencil target for the output-merger stage.
